short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TaskCrusher lets you hire freelances from Toptal and Upwork directly from Trello

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Taskcrusher for Trello is a Chrome Extension that adds a "Get Freelancer" button to your Trello cards so you can export your card a job ready to be published in Upwork.com.





No affiliation with Trello nor Upwork. For more information visit taskcrusher.co
